document.discussion_title: Man caught doing 146mph on A449 near Newport
document.topic_text: Man caught doing 146mph on A449 near Newport Man caught doing 146mph on A449 near Newport Share: A MAN was caught driving his car at 146mph on the A449 near Newport. The 30-year-old was caught by a camera on the A449 near Junction 24 of the M4 . Garron Duane Groves, from Hereford, appeared at Newport Magistrates Court on Monday 18th April 2016 having pleaded guilty to dangerous driving. He was sentenced to prison for 12 weeks suspended for two years along with 100 hours of unpaid work. Inspector Lee Ford said: "This is a clear example of dangerous driving that leads to death and serious injury on our roads. This particular offender showed no regard to his own or any other road user’s safety." Share:
